show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #2 Michael Kinsey "Double Meat Mondays"
subtitle: #2 Michael Kinsey "Double Meat Mondays"
summary:
Ranching Reboot: Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers.

Join us for episode 2 of Ranching Reboot! 

We sit down with Michael Kinsey, from Reverent Wild Ranch to talk about a variety of topics from how Michael got started, to how we can break out of government subsidies and start supporting local producers. Michael is a man with no product, only truth.
